Class Network

java.lang.Object
Network
public class Network extends Object
Class that represent the network and contains all the methods. Contains one ArrayLists, people.

    • getNetwork

      Implementation of the singleton pattern
      Returns:
      network object

    • addToNetwork

      public void addToNetwork(String pIdentifier, String pName, String pSurname, String pBirthday, String pGender, String pBirthplace, String pHometown, ArrayList<String> pStudiedat, ArrayList<String> pWorkedat, ArrayList<String> pMovies, String pGroupCode)
      Method that add a person to the network
      Parameters:
      pIdentifier - Identifier of the person
      pName - Name of the person
      pSurname - Surname of the person
      pBirthday - Birthday of the person
      pGender - Gender of the person
      pBirthplace - Birthplace of the person
      pHometown - Hometown of the person
      pStudiedat - Where has the person studied
      pWorkedat - Where has the person worked
      pMovies - Favorites movies of the person
      pGroupCode - Code of the group

    • loadFromFile

      Method that loads from the file all the people given as example.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file we want to do the import from.

      d2 - second date (higher than d1)

      Method that prints the name, surname, birthdate and place of study of the people whose birthplace is the same hometown of the different people in residential.txt
